summary.span: 在 控件中实现可选择的项。

span.span: Implements a selectable item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 ，它表示对象的标头和集合可以是任何类型 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 控件可以嵌入 到其他控件中，以在控件中创建节点的层次结构 。 controls can be embedded inside other controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a control. 下图显示了中的控件层次结构 。The following illustration shows a hierarchy of controls inside a . ![TreeView 图](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 图")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 若要展开或折叠 ，请使用 属性。To expand or collapse a , use the property. 有关控件的详细信息 ，请参阅 [TreeView 概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview). ## 自定义 TreeViewItem 控件Customizing the TreeViewItem Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [TreeView 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在控件中创建控件层次结构 。The following example shows how to create a hierarchy of controls in a control. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSnips#EmbeddedTVIs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#embeddedtvis)]

[!code-xaml[TreeViewExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/treeviewexpand/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#1)] 下面的代码遍历 以查找选定的 ，然后调用 以显示选定的所有子项 。The following code traverses the to find the selected and then calls to display all child items of the selected . > [!NOTE] > 此 `GetTreeViewItem` 方法仅适用于 未虚拟化的控件。The `GetTreeViewItem` method only works for controls that are not virtualized. 若要了解如何查找 可以虚拟化的，请参阅 [如何：在 TreeView 中查找 TreeViewItem](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview)。To learn how to find a that may be virtualized, see [How to: Find a TreeViewItem in a TreeView](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview). summary.span: 提供用于 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果鼠标 为2，则属性的值将 切换到 `true` 或 `false` ，这将导致 展开或折叠。If the mouse is two, the value of the property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the to expand or collapse. 此实现 通过将 事件数据的属性设置为来将事件标记为已处理 `true` 。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当选择从控件中的另一项更改为其他时，将发生此事件 。The event occurs when the selection changes from this to another in a control. 此事件与 控件的属性发生更改时发生的事件相关 。This event is related to the event that occurs when there is a change in the property of a control. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将事件的事件处理程序分配 给 ，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a , and how to define the event handler.
